group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Oh, you're back? |

group_1.textLeft: > | It's a long story... |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Aaah, I see... |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | If it's so dangerous... |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | I suppose I'll have to postpone getting@a body until I can find a safer way... |

group_1.textLeft: | We can't find a safe way. |
| Nemu said that she won't@be trying this anymore. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Oh dear, that's zero out of one for our creator! |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Very well, I'll give up on it... |

group_1.textLeft: | Do you agree, Anonymous AI? |

group_1.textRight: > | What do you mean? |

group_1.textLeft: | About not being able to get a body. |

group_1.textRight: > | Yes, I'm convinced. |

group_1.textLeft: | I see... |
| After a safe way is found... |
| If you ask Nemu if you@can stay with Sana forever... |
| Nemu might be able to@rewrite your [textBlue:Rumor] again. |

group_1.textRight: > | Why are you worrying about me,@Eternal Sakura? |

group_1.textLeft: | I wonder... |
| Maybe it's because I understand not being able@to see someone even when you really want to. |

group_1.textRight: > | But, it really is okay. |
> | I want to be with her, but I'm just an Uwasa. |
> | It's too much to hope for. |

group_1.textLeft: | What's wrong with wishing for this? |

group_1.textRight: > | It hurts to hope for something@that I know won't happen... |
> | I'm an Uwasa. All I can do is wish@for her happiness from here. |
> | Even if I can't be by her side... |
> | I'm happy just to be able to think of her... |

group_1.textLeft: This is Mikazuki Villa...!
Although, this is just the@version of it in my memory...
This is the place where Iroha@and everyone welcomed me...

group_1.textRight: >It's a warm place.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
I've always wanted to introduce@everyone to you, Ai...

group_1.textRight: >Thank you very much, Sana...
>I'm very glad to hear that@>you and Iroha are getting along.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad...
You know...@I'm really glad to have met you, Ai...
Because if I hadn't, I wouldn't have@found the place that I'm in now...

group_1.textRight: >I'm glad to have been useful for you, Sana.

group_1.textLeft: You, Iroha, and everyone else...
I've always relied on all of you to protect me, but...
From now on, I want to be@strong and protect everyone...!

group_1.textRight: >Sana...

group_1.textLeft: I'm scared...but I want to do my best...@So let me make this promise to you...

group_1.textRight: >Yes, it's a promise.
>...Though it hasn't been long...@>You've gotten so much stronger...

group_1.textLeft: You, you think so...?

group_1.textRight: >Yes...
>I'd like to stay close by, forever,@>to watch you as you grow.
>But I can't do that.@>I'm just an Uwasa.
>This will probably be the last time@>you and I see each other...

group_1.textLeft: ...Y...[wait:0.8][chara:100400:cheek_1][chara:100400:lipSynch_1]Yeah...

group_1.narration: ―Ai―@>There, let me also make a promise.
―Ai―@>Even in the book, I'll be thinking of you always@>as you keep your promise to me.
―Ai―@>I wish you all the best, Sana...
